goal_descEN: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
target_descEN: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment
indicator_descEN: Volume of production per labour unit by classes of farming/pastoral/forestry enterprise size
seriesDescription: Productivity of small-scale food producers (agricultural output per labour day, PPP) (constant 2011 international $)
